amendment.description: Amendment to prohibit funds to be used to purchase light bulbs unless the light bulb have the "ENERGY STAR" or "Federal Energy Management Program" designation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit funds to be used to purchase light bulbs unless the light bulb have the "ENERGY STAR" or "Federal Energy Management Program" designation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Upton amendment (A050) Agreed to by recorded vote: 404 - 16 (Roll no. 738).
